SubjectVeterans' Ombudsman - Amendment to P.C. 2007-530
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2007-530 of April 3, 2007 by changing the terms of employment of the VETERANS' OMBUDSMAN , a special adviser to the Minister of Veterans Affairs, effective November 11, 2010.
